name: CreateDepartment
description:
Create a new department within an organization.

This tool is used to create a new department in an organization. It requires appropriate permissions and should be called when a user needs to add a new department to their organization in the Ashby system.

parameters.name: department_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing 'name', 'externalName', and 'parentId' for the department being created.

name.description: The name of the department or team

externalName.description: An alternate candidate-facing name for this department that will be used on Ashby job boards

parentId.description: The id of the department's parent department
